MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetConfusionTable (Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IHost host, Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataView confusionDataView, out string weightedConfusionTable, bool binary = true, int sample = -1);

.method public static hidebysig string GetConfusionTable(class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IHost host, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataView confusionDataView, [out] string& weightedConfusionTable, bool binary, int32 sample) cil managed

Public Shared Function GetConfusionTable (host As IHost, confusionDataView As IDataView, ByRef weightedConfusionTable As String, Optional binary As Boolean = true, Optional sample As Integer = -1) As String
static member GetConfusionTable : Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IHost * Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataView * * bool * int -> string

Docs.param: The host is used for getting the random number generator for sampling classes

The data view containing the confusion matrix. It should contain a text column with the label names named "LabelNames", and an R8 vector column named "Count" containing the counts: in the row corresponding to label i, slot j should contain the number of class i examples that were predicted as j by the predictor.
If there is an R8 vector column named "Weight" containing the weighted counts, this parameter is assigned the string representation of the weighted confusion table. Otherwise it is assigned null.
Indicates whether the confusion table is for binary classification.
Indicates how many classes to sample from the confusion table (-1 indicates no sampling)
Docs.summary: Get the confusion tables as strings to be printed to the Console.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataView GetNonStratifiedMetrics (Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IHostEnvironment env, Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataView data);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataView GetNonStratifiedMetrics(class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IHostEnvironment env, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataView data) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetNonStratifiedMetrics (env As IHostEnvironment, data As IDataView) As IDataView
static member GetNonStratifiedMetrics : Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IHostEnvironment * Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataView -> Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataView

Docs.summary: Filter out the stratified results from overall and drop the stratification columns.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetPerFoldResults (Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IHostEnvironment env, Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataView fold, out string weightedMetrics);
.method public static hidebysig string GetPerFoldResults(class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IHostEnvironment env, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataView fold, [out] string& weightedMetrics) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetPerFoldResults (env As IHostEnvironment, fold As IDataView, ByRef weightedMetrics As String) As String
static member GetPerFoldResults : Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IHostEnvironment * Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataView * -> string

Docs.param: The data view containing the per-fold metrics. Each row in the data view represents a set of metrics calculated either on the whole dataset or on a subset of it defined by a stratification column. If the data view contains stratified metrics, it must contain two text columns named "StratCol" and "StratVal", containing the stratification column name, and a text description of the value. In this case, the value of column StratVal in the row corresponding to the entire dataset should contain the text "overall", and the value of column StratCol should be DvText.NA. If weighted metrics are present then the data view should also contain a DvBool column named "IsWeighted".
If the IsWeighted column exists, this is assigned the string representation of the weighted metrics. Otherwise it is assigned null.
Docs.summary: This method returns the per-fold metrics as a string. If weighted metrics are present they are returned in a separate string.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void PrintOverallMetrics (Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IHostEnvironment env, Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IChannel ch, string filename, Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataView overall, int numFolds);

.method public static hidebysig void PrintOverallMetrics(class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IHostEnvironment env, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IChannel ch, string filename, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataView overall, int32 numFolds) cil managed
Public Shared Sub PrintOverallMetrics (env As IHostEnvironment, ch As IChannel, filename As String, overall As IDataView, numFolds As Integer)
static member PrintOverallMetrics : Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IHostEnvironment * Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IChannel * string * Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataView * int -> unit

Docs.summary: Print the overall results to the Console. The overall data view should contain rows from all the folds being averaged. If filename is not null then also save the results to the specified file. The first row in the file is the averaged results, followed by the results of each fold.

Docs.summary: Searches for a warning dataview in the given dictionary, and if present, prints the warnings to the given channel. The warning dataview should contain a text column named "WarningText".
